author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Pandakkal Muhurtham marking the commencement of the arrangements for the 169th aradhana celebrations of Saint Tyagaraja was performed at the Samadhi of the composer on the banks of the Cauvery at Tiruvaiyaru district on Wednesday.

Speaking on the occasion Sri Tyagabrahma Mahotsava Sabha president G.R. Moopanar said that the aradhana celebrations would be inaugurated on January 24 by Sri Krishna Gana Sabha president Nalli G. Kuppuswamy Chetty and the main aradhana would be observed on the Pushya Bahula Panchami day that falls on January 28, when chorus rendering of the saint composers Pancharatna Kritis would be performed by musicians and instrumentalists.
title: Tyagaraja aradhana celebrations begin
